| HistoryText             = With [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]]'s [[Jotunheim Strikeforce (Earth-616)|strikeforce]] dispatched to [[Jotunheim]] to rescue [[Thor Odinson (Earth-616)|Thor]] and [[Freyja Freyrdottir (Earth-616)|Lady Freyja]] leading a strikeforce to destroy the [[Black Bifrost]] in [[Svartalfheim]], [[Carol Danvers (Earth-616)|Captain Marvel]] assembled her own strikeforce to protect [[Earth|Midgard]]. Danvers recruited a team of powerful heroes and antiheroes -- [[Natalia Romanova (Earth-616)|Black Widow]], [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]], [[Sif (Earth-616)|Lady Sif]], [[Venom (Symbiote) (Earth-616)|Venom]], [[Clayton Cortez (Earth-616)|Weapon H]], and the [[James Buchanan Barnes (Earth-616)|Winter Soldier]] -- and led them into several forays against the invading [[Dark Elves]], [[Frost Giants]], and [[Fire Demons of Muspelheim|Fire Goblins]].{{r|War of the Realms Strikeforce: The War Avengers Vol 1 1}}

Upon learning from [[Brian Braddock (Earth-616)|Captain Britain]] that [[Malekith (Earth-616)|Malekith]] was conquering [[London (England)|London]], Danvers led the team to cut off the head of the snake. While the rest of the team engaged Malekith's dark elf forces, Venom attempted to kill the warlord himself, but was subdued by the [[Ebony Blade]] and captured.{{r|War of the Realms Vol 1 3}}
